==== Definition of psychotherapy ====
Any use of psychological means to treat a psychiatric disorder or for [[Know the definition of psychotherapy OIC-073-01-A#%20msocom%201|[FB1]]] any other non-psychiatric problem causing psychological suffering or distress
----[[Know the definition of the term psychotherapy OIC-073-01-A#%20msoanchor%201|[FB1]]]<nowiki/>for too much?

properties.question: What is the primary purpose of psychotherapy?
properties.option_a: To treat physical ailments using psychological methods
properties.option_b: To provide medication for psychiatric disorders
properties.option_c: To use psychological means to treat psychiatric disorders or other psychological distress
properties.option_d: To improve physical fitness and well-being through exercise
